About Trailblazers

Trailblazers started out on a journey of discovery, learning and sharing in the summer of 1993. We have traveled, shared, learnt and taught children of all ages. We are The Outdoor School. And Nature is our Guru. Over the years we have designed, planned & conducted extraordinary learning programmes across India & Internationally, for 300 plus premiere institutions from Mumbai and major Indian cities. Schools include Deutsche Schule of Bombay International, Mercedes Benz International School, American School of Bombay, etc. In our quest to give back to the society, we actively partner voluntary organisations such as Pride India, Yusuf Meherally Center - a rural NGO and many more.


© 2017 Trailblazers Adventure Travel Pvt. Ltd. Terms Privacy
